summary: chelsea have made an offer for fc tokyo 's 22 - year - old forward yoshinori muto , according to club president naoki ogane . the japan international , who has played for the j - league side since 2013 , will join chelsea 's dutch partner club vitesse arnhem on loan next season if he completes a move to stamford bridge this summer . ogane claims that chelsea 's interest in muto is not connected to the Â£ 200million sponsorship deal they signed with japanese company yokohama rubber in february .

explain: Chelsea has offered a deal to FC Tokyo's Yoshinori Muto, who could be the first Japanese player to represent the club if the deal goes through. Muto has been playing for the J-League side since 2013 and if he joins Chelsea, he will join their Dutch partner club Vitesse Arnhem on loan next season.
